meanings.definition: To make modern in appearance or style.
meanings.sent1: She modernizes her wardrobe by adding trendy accessories.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer modernizes the living room with sleek furniture.
meanings.sent3: The old-fashioned hat modernizes her entire outfit, making her look like a fashion icon.
meanings.sent4: Her innovative approach to fashion modernizes the industry, setting new trends.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors and clean lines of the painting modernizes the room instantly.

meanings.definition: To bring up to date in technology or methods.
meanings.sent1: The company modernizes its software to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent2: He modernizes the manufacturing process by introducing automation.
meanings.sent3: The robot modernizes the household chores, making life easier for everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her creative use of technology modernizes the way we communicate.
meanings.sent5: The new smartphone modernizes the way we access information, revolutionizing daily tasks.
